original_text: But the Israelites walked on dry ground through the middle of the sea. The water was like a wall on their right side and on their left side.
korean_text: 그러나 이스라엘 자손은 바다 가운데를 육지로 행하였고 물이 좌우에 벽이 되었더라

sentences.original_text: But the Israelites walked on dry ground
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 이스라엘 백성은 마른 땅을 걸었고

sentences.original_text: through the middle of the sea
The water was like a wall
on their right side and on their left side
